Dear ${object.partner_name},


Thank you for submitting your application for the position of ${object.job_id.name}. We are currently reviewing resumes and will be scheduling interviews. You will be contacted if we need additional information or wish to schedule a phone or personal interview with you. If you are not selected for an interview, we encourage you to view our job postings regularly as new positions are posted frequently.


Again, thank you for applying for employment with ${object.company_id.name}



Best regards,

Human Resources Department

OLiLA Group

Dear ${object.partner_name},


Thank you for your application for the ${object.job_id.name} position at ${object.company_id.name}. We were impressed by your background. Your qualifications make you an excellent candidate for this role. I would like to invite you to a face-to-face interview at our office.


Your interview is scheduled for Day_Month_Year, at Time at our office ${object.company_id.address}


During the interview, you will have the chance to learn more about the role and to develop a deeper understanding of our company’s objectives. On our end, we want to understand your career goals and professional experience more so.


Please respond with your availability. If you have any questions or problems, please contact me at Phone ${object.company_id.phone}. We look forward to seeing you.



Best regards,

Human Resources Department

OLiLA Group

Dear ${object.partner_name},


Thank you for taking the time to consider ${object.company_id.name}. Our recruitment team reviewed your application and we’d like to inform you that we are not able to advance you to the next step for the ${object.job_id.name} position at this time.


We encourage you to apply again in the future, if you find an open role at our company that suits you.


The recruitment team thanks you for the time you invested in applying for the ${object.job_id.name} position. We encourage you to apply for future openings for which you qualify.

Thank you again for applying to ${object.company_id.name} and we wish you all the best in your job search.



Regards,

Human Resources Department

OLiLA Group
